name: Free Spirit
text: This spell allows you to channel the essence of Cayden Cailean’s philosophy, giving you the benefits of a freedom of movement spell and granting you a +4 bonus on saving throws against fear effects. The spell also makes you drunk. For the duration of the spell, you take a –2 penalty on attack rolls, ability checks, skill checks, and concentration checks. If you somehow remove or avoid these penalties, the spell’s duration ends.
text_zh: 这个法术可以让你引导出凯登·凯连哲学的精髓，让你获得行动自如（Freedom Of Movement)法术的好处，并给予你对恐惧效果的豁免中+4的加值。这个法术也会让你醉倒（drunk）。在法术持续期间，你在攻击检定、能力检定、技能检定和专注检定中受到-2的惩罚。如果你以某种方式消除或避免这些惩罚，法术的持续时间就会结束。
